title: Ed Sheeran reveals surprising weight loss secret after dropping over three stone
text:
Celebs Ed Sheeran reveals surprising weight loss secret after dropping over three stone The Castle on the Hill hitmaker thought all of his clothes had shrunk after piling on the pounds with a pizza and beer diet Share Get celebs   Could   
Ed Sheeran has made his comeback and he's better not bigger this time around. 
The Thinking Out Loud hitmaker , 25, has shed a whopping three stone since his time away and he's done it in a surprising way. 
Ed swears by a working out just 10 minutes a day and was given a high-intensity regime by his girlfriend Cherry Seaborn, 24. 
“I didn't realise how active I was on tour,” Ed explained. Ed Sheeran BBC Radio 1 Breakfast Show (Photo: BBC) Ed Sheeran BBC Radio 1 Breakfast Show (Photo: BBC) 
“My diet was pizza and beer, but because I was doing two hours a night I was really in shape. 
“I stopped touring and carried on my diet of pizza and beer. Suddenly I didn’t fit in anything. Ed Sheeran at the Grammys (Photo: Getty) 
“I was like, ‘All my clothes have shrunk’.” 
Ed, who is on course to make chart history after making his comeback with two singles – Shape of You and Castle on the Hill - has dropped to 11.5 stone. 
Speaking on Total Access on Signal 1 radio, he said: 
“I did ten minutes a day without fail — intervals of 30 seconds sprinting and 30 jogging. 
“The key is to not miss a day, so you don’t have to do an hour.” Like us on Facebook
